oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Centennial celebrations; Exhibition buildings; Exhibitions; Events; Fairs; Anniversaries; Celebrations; Commemorations; Flags; Gondolas; Lakes & ponds; Passengers
Tennessee Centennial and International Exposition (1897 : Nashville, Tenn.)
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: View of the Agriculture Building across Lake Watauga at the Tennessee Centennial Exposition. A passenger-filled gondola is shown on the lake.
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Calvert Bros. & Taylor
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The Agriculture Building had a large central dome surrounded by six smaller domes. Five of these domes were dedicated to Tennessee's agricultural contributions, including corn, cotton, and tobacco.
